mapper.select: select category_id, category_name, category_type, create_time, update_time, sell_id from product_category where sell_id = #{SellId}
select count(1) from product_category where sell_id = #{SellId}
mapper.insert: insert into product_category (category_id ,category_name, category_type, create_time, update_time, sell_id) values (#{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{categoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{categoryType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sellId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
